skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot captures a first-person perspective of a long, narrow corridor. The walls, floor, and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, off-white tiles, creating a disorienting grid pattern that recedes into a hazy, indistinct distance. The camera moves steadily forward through the sterile-looking space.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot captures a first-person perspective of a long, narrow corridor. The walls, floor, and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, off-white tiles, creating a disorienting grid pattern that recedes into a hazy, indistinct distance.
